00037 class TruncatedLorentzian : public ParametrizedFunction< std::complex<double> >
00038 {
00039     public:
00040 
00041     enum ParameterIndex {AlphaR, AlphaI, Tau, F0};
00042 
00043     TruncatedLorentzian(double T); // cutoff value T
00044     ~TruncatedLorentzian();
00045 
00046     virtual unsigned int parameterCount() const {return 4;}
00047     virtual std::complex<double> operator()(double f, const ublas::vector<double>& p) const;
00048     virtual ublas::vector< std::complex<double> > dp(double f, const ublas::vector<double>& p) const;
00049     virtual ublas::matrix< std::complex<double> > dp2(double f, const ublas::vector<double>& p) const;
00050 
00051     void outputSamples(const std::string& filename, const ublas::vector<double>& p,
00052                        double shift = 0, double scale = 1) const;
00053

00055     class Impl;
